channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP User Profile Avatar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP User Profile Avatar

item.title: CVE-2023-6384|2024-08-02T08:28:21.790Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20profile%20avatar
item.description: The WP User Profile Avatar WordPress plugin before 1.0.1 does not properly check for authorisation, allowing authors to delete and update arbitrary avatar

item.title: CVE-2023-6067|2024-08-02T08:21:17.215Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20profile%20avatar
item.description: The WP User Profile Avatar WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2023-6067|2024-04-15T05:00:01.200Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20profile%20avatar
item.description: The WP User Profile Avatar WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2023-6067|2024-07-31T15:24:22.699Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20profile%20avatar
item.description: The WP User Profile Avatar WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
